channel.title: Swf file not playing
channel.description:
i have uploaded a swf file to my site but i cant get it to play, when i right click on it it just say "movie not loaded..."
here is the code i used to embed it [code]<OBJECT classid='clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000' codebase='http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0' width="520" height="640"> <param name='movie' value="http://lordbost.com/lordbost.swf"> <param name='quality' value="high"> <param name='bgcolor' value='#000000'> <param name='loop' value="true"> <EMBED src="http://lordbost.com/lordbost.swf" quality='high' bgcolor='#000000' width="520" height="640" loop="true" type='application/x-shockwave-flash' pluginspage='http://www.macromedia.com/shockwave/download/index.cgi?P1_Prod_Version=ShockwaveFlash'> </EMBED> </OBJECT>[/code]
http://lordbost.com
EDIT: ... right after i posted this it worked...
New problem, i cant get it to loop, anyone know what i can do to make it loop?
EDIT2: are the any programs i can use to lower the file size of the swf file?

item.title: Swf file not playing
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“lordbost, post:8, topic:322235”]thanks for the help, but it still wont loop.

you can see for yourself here[/quote]
pretty sure that the looping is done within the flash file itself, just set the last frame to

gotoAndPlay(1);

and then when it reachesthe last frame it’ll start again

Read full topic

[code]

item.title: Swf file not playing
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:5, topic:322235”][quote author=lordbost link=topic=418635.msg3076812#msg3076812 date=1261885843]
I converted it from a avi file.
Is it possible to import it into flash and make it loop there?
If so, can someone do it for me? I don’t have flash installed.

http://lordbost.com/lordbost.swf (right click and choose “save as…”)
[/quote]
Not even norton could stop that virus.[/quote]
what?
